means: <英方>笨重的人，高球( lob的名词复数 )
打缓慢的球，蹒跚地走( lob的第三人称单数 )

sentence.Network_en: The German outside - right lobs the ball to the goal.
sentence.Network_cn: 德国队的右边锋往门前吊高球.

sentence.Network_en: Labeled optical burst switching ( LOBS ) is a new emerging optical switching technology.
sentence.Network_cn: 光标签突发包交换是一种新出现的光交换技术.

sentence.Network_en: The LOBS technology is introduced completely , including the network architecture.
sentence.Network_cn: 全面介绍了这种光交换技术, 重点描述了其网络结构.

PerfectNetExp.abs: he also adjusts to errant passes ( especially lobs ) very well , mainly because his balance is exceptional and a pair of very soft hands .他也适应不停地传球（特别是慢球)，这主要是他的平衡非常不错，还有一双非常柔软的手。
lobry 洛布里, lobs 洛布斯, lobs-ter 龙虾

list.abs: flank pass 边线传球lobbing pass 高吊传球volley pass 凌空传球
...，手臂伸直、力度较大， 故守门员较难有效阻拦。 吊射（lob shot） 水球运动技术名词射门动作之一。 指进攻者运用假动作， 吸  …
在保罗确定交易来到快艇后，葛里芬曾兴奋地表示：「我们将成为空接之城(Lob City)！」。意思是，凭藉保罗巧妙的助攻传球，葛里 …
有「空抛之城(lob city)」的快艇队，向来最不缺乏的就是空中接力美技，尤其是阵中体能劲爆的「双飞塔」葛瑞芬(Blake Griifin)和乔丹…
loaves 烤过食物lob along 跑lob 打缓慢的球

entry.def: If you lob something, you throw it so that it goes quite high in the air.

example.ex: Enemy forces lobbed a series of artillery shells onto the city...
example.tran: 敌军对该城发起连串炮轰。

example.ex: A group of protesters gathered outside, chanting and lobbing firebombs.
example.tran: 一群抗议人士聚集在外面，边喊口号边扔燃烧弹。

entry.def: In sport, if you lob the ball, you hit or kick it high into the air so that it lands behind your opponent.

example.ex: Brown lobbed the ball over the Australian goalkeeper.
example.tran: 布朗把球挑过澳大利亚门将的头顶。

auth_sentence.content: North Korea periodically lobs missiles in the direction of Japan.
auth_sentence.res_content: North Korea periodically lobs missiles in the direction of Japan.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: North Korea periodically lobs missiles in the direction of Japan.

auth_sentence.content: Jack crushes the bag with the half-eaten Bavarian Kreme inside and lobs it into a wastebasket.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Jack crushes the bag with the half-eaten Bavarian Kreme inside and lobs it into a wastebasket.
